meanings.sent1: She walked moderato towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: He spoke moderato during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat moved moderato as it chased the butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Time passed moderato, like a gentle stream flowing.
meanings.sent5: The sun set moderato, casting a soft glow over the horizon.

meanings.definition: A tempo marking indicating a moderate speed in music
meanings.sent1: The pianist played the piece at moderato tempo.
meanings.sent2: The conductor signaled for the orchestra to play moderato.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped in a moderato rhythm, creating a peaceful melody.
meanings.sent4: The car engine hummed along at a moderato pace.
meanings.sent5: The dancers moved in perfect synchrony to the moderato beat of the music.
